articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Indore pitch rating for India-Australia encounter changed after BCCI appeal - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The pitch rating for Indore's Holkar Stadium, the venue for the third Test between India and Australia, has been changed after BCCI's appeal.
articles.content: The pitch rating for Indore's Holkar Stadium, the venue for the third Test between India and Australia, has been changed after BCCI's appeal.The pitch for the third Test of the Border-Gavaskar series… [+1299 chars]
